00049 ros::NodeHandle *n;

00051 bool runApp = true;
00052 bool testMode = false;
00053 bool saveLocs = false;
00054 bool saveOrientations = false;
00055 bool liveView = false;
00056 bool persistentDisplay = true;

00058 VectorDisplay* display;
00059 QApplication* app;
00060 ros::ServiceClient client;
00061 ros::ServiceClient localizationClient;
00062 char* map_name;
00063 
00064 void callback(vector2d loc,vector2d loc2,double orientation,int type)
00065 {
00066   static const bool debug = false;
00067   static FILE* fid=NULL;
00068   if(saveLocs && fid==NULL)
00069     fid = fopen("savedLocs.txt","aw");
00070   if(saveLocs){
00071     if(saveOrientations){
00072       fprintf(fid, "%f,%f,%f\n",V2COMP(loc),(loc2-loc).angle());
00073       printf("Saved location: %f,%f,%f\n",V2COMP(loc),(loc2-loc).angle());
00074     }else{
00075       fprintf(fid, "%f,%f,%f,%f\n",V2COMP(loc),V2COMP(loc2));
00076       printf("Saved location: %f,%f,%f,%f\n",V2COMP(loc),V2COMP(loc2));
00077     }
00078     
00079   }
00080   LocalizationInterfaceSrv srv;
00081   srv.request.loc_x = loc.x;
00082   srv.request.loc_y = loc.y;
00083   srv.request.orientation = orientation;
00084   srv.request.map = map_name;
00085   switch(type){
00086     case 3:{
00087       //Set Position
00088       if(debug) printf("SetPosition: %7.3f,%7.3f %6.1f\u00b0\n",V2COMP(loc),DEG(orientation));
00089       client = localizationClient;
00090     }break;
00091     case 2:{
00092       //Set Target
00093       if(debug) printf("SetTarget: %7.3f,%7.3f %6.1f\u00b0\n",V2COMP(loc),DEG(orientation));
00094       //client = navigationClient;
00095     }break;
00096   }
00097   if(type==2 || type==3){
00098     if(client.call(srv)){
00099       
00100     }else{
00101       printf("Failed to send command!\n");
00102     }
00103   }
00104 }
00105 
00106 class MyThread : public QThread
00107 {
00108   //Q_OBJECT
00109   string mapsFolder;
00110   VectorMap vectorMap;
00111   vector<vector2d> pathPlan;
00112   vector2d robotLoc;
00113   double robotAngle;
00114   sensor_msgs::LaserScan laserScanMsg;
00115   vector<DisplayMsg> displayMsgs;
00116   vector<string> displayProviders;
00117   double tPathPlan, tDisplay, tLaser;
00118   
00119   vector<line2f> lines;
00120   vector<vector2f> points;
00121   vector<vector2f> circles;
00122   vector<VectorDisplay::Color> circleColors;
00123   vector<VectorDisplay::Color> lineColors;
00124   vector<VectorDisplay::Color> pointColors;
00125   
00126 public:
00127   void drawMap(vector<line2f> &lines, vector<VectorDisplay::Color> &lineColors)
00128   {
00129     int numLines = vectorMap.lines.size();
00130     for(int i=0; i<numLines; i++){
00131       lines.push_back(line2f(vectorMap.lines[i].P0().x,vectorMap.lines[i].P0().y,
00132                               vectorMap.lines[i].P1().x,vectorMap.lines[i].P1().y));
00133       lineColors.push_back(VectorDisplay::Color(0.32, 0.49, 0.91));
00134     }
00135   }
00136   
00137   void localizationCallback(const LocalizationMsg& msg)
00138   {
00139     static const bool debug = false;
00140     if(debug) printf("Localization update: %f,%f, %f\u00b0, %s\n",msg.x,msg.y,DEG(msg.angle),msg.map.c_str());
00141     robotLoc = vector2d(msg.x, msg.y);
00142     robotAngle = msg.angle;
00143     snprintf(map_name, 4095, "%s",msg.map.c_str());
00144     if(msg.map.compare(vectorMap.mapName)!=0){
00145       vectorMap.loadMap(msg.map.c_str(), false);
00146     }
00147   }
00148   
00149   void laserCallback(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& msg)
00150   {
00151     laserScanMsg = msg;
00152     tLaser = GetTimeSec();
00153   }
00154     
00155   void statusCallback(const ros::MessageEvent<DisplayMsg const>& msgEvent)
00156   { 
00157     static const bool debug = false;
00158     const DisplayMsgConstPtr &msg = msgEvent.getConstMessage();
00159     bool duplicate = false;
00160     unsigned int i=0;
00161     for(;i<displayProviders.size() && !duplicate; i++){
00162       if(displayProviders[i].compare(msgEvent.getPublisherName())==0)
00163         duplicate = true;
00164     }
00165     if(duplicate){
00166       i--;
00167       displayMsgs[i] = *msg;
00168       if(debug) printf("Duplicate message from %s\n",displayProviders[i].c_str());
00169     }else{
00170       displayMsgs.push_back(*msg);
00171       displayProviders.push_back(msgEvent.getPublisherName());
00172       if(debug) printf("New message from %s\n",displayProviders[i].c_str());
00173     }
00174   }
00175   
00176   void compileDisplay()
00177   {
00178     static double tLast = 0.0;
00179     static const double MessageTimeout = 1.0;
00180     static const int LidarPointColor = 0xF0761F;
00181     static const bool debug = false;
00182     if(debug) printf("GUI updated!\n");
00183     
00184     if(GetTimeSec()-tLast<0.016)
00185       return;
00186     tLast = GetTimeSec();
00187     
00188     lines.clear();
00189     points.clear();
00190     circles.clear();
00191     circleColors.clear();
00192     lineColors.clear();
00193     pointColors.clear();
00194     
00195     drawMap(lines, lineColors);
00196     for(unsigned int j=0; j<displayMsgs.size(); j++){
00197       DisplayMsg displayMsg = displayMsgs[j];
00198       if(GetTimeSec()-tDisplay<MessageTimeout || persistentDisplay){
00199         unsigned int numLines = min(min((int)displayMsg.lines_p1x.size(),(int)displayMsg.lines_p1y.size()),min((int)displayMsg.lines_p2x.size(),(int)displayMsg.lines_p2y.size()));
00200         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numLines; i++){
00201           lines.push_back(line2f(displayMsg.lines_p1x[i],displayMsg.lines_p1y[i],displayMsg.lines_p2x[i],displayMsg.lines_p2y[i]));
00202           if(i<displayMsg.lines_col.size())
00203             lineColors.push_back(displayMsg.lines_col[i]);
00204         }
00205         unsigned int numPoints = min(displayMsg.points_x.size(),displayMsg.points_y.size());
00206         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numPoints; i++){
00207           points.push_back(vector2f(displayMsg.points_x[i],displayMsg.points_y[i]));
00208           if(i<displayMsg.points_col.size())
00209             pointColors.push_back(VectorDisplay::Color(displayMsg.points_col[i]));
00210         }
00211         unsigned int numCircles = min(displayMsg.circles_x.size(),displayMsg.circles_y.size());
00212         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numCircles; i++){
00213           circles.push_back(vector2f(displayMsg.circles_x[i],displayMsg.circles_y[i]));
00214           if(i<displayMsg.circles_col.size())
00215             circleColors.push_back(VectorDisplay::Color(displayMsg.circles_col[i]));
00216         }
00217       }
00218     }
00219     if(debug){
00220       printf("lines: %d points: %d circles: %d\n",int(lines.size()), int(points.size()), int(circles.size()));
00221     }
00222     //displayMsgs.clear();
00223     //displayProviders.clear();
00224     
00225     if((GetTimeSec()-tLaser<MessageTimeout || persistentDisplay) && liveView){
00226       unsigned int i=0;
00227       float a=0.0;
00228       vector2f laserLoc(0.145,0.0), p(0.0,0.0);
00229       laserLoc = vector2f(V2COMP(robotLoc)) + laserLoc.rotate(robotAngle);
00230       for(i=0, a = robotAngle + laserScanMsg.angle_min; i<laserScanMsg.ranges.size(); i++, a+=laserScanMsg.angle_increment){
00231         if(laserScanMsg.ranges[i]<=laserScanMsg.range_min || laserScanMsg.ranges[i]>=laserScanMsg.range_max)
00232           continue;
00233         p.heading(a);
00234         p = p*laserScanMsg.ranges[i]+laserLoc;
00235         points.push_back(p);
00236         pointColors.push_back(LidarPointColor);
00237       }
00238     }
00239     
00240     if(GetTimeSec()-tPathPlan<MessageTimeout || persistentDisplay){
00241       if(pathPlan.size()>0){
00242         lines.push_back(line2f(pathPlan[0].x, pathPlan[0].y, robotLoc.x, robotLoc.y));
00243         lineColors.push_back(0x00FF00);
00244         points.push_back(vector2f(V2COMP(pathPlan[0])));
00245         pointColors.push_back(0xFF0000);
00246       }
00247       for(int i=0; i<int(pathPlan.size())-1; i++){
00248         lines.push_back(line2f(pathPlan[i].x, pathPlan[i].y, pathPlan[i+1].x, pathPlan[i+1].y));
00249         lineColors.push_back(0x00FF00);
00250         points.push_back(vector2f(V2COMP(pathPlan[i])));
00251         points.push_back(vector2f(V2COMP(pathPlan[i+1])));
00252         pointColors.push_back(0xFF0000);
00253         pointColors.push_back(0xFF0000);
00254       }
00255     }
00256     
00257     display->updateDisplay(robotLoc,robotAngle, 100.0, lines, points, circles, lineColors, pointColors, circleColors);
00258   }
00259   
00260 protected:
00261   void run()
00262   {
00263     static const bool debug = false;
00264     
00265     if(testMode){
00266       while(runApp && ros::ok()){
00267         float scale = 0.005;
00268         int numLines = 10;
00269         int numPoints = 800;
00270         vector<line2f> lines;
00271         vector<vector2f> points;
00272         double dTheta = 2.0*M_PI/double(numLines);
00273         vector2d offset(1000.0,0.0);
00274         double theta = 0.0;
00275         double omega = RAD(30.0);
00276         for(int i=0; i<numLines; i++){
00277           vector2d p(1000.0,0.0), p1,p2;
00278           p1 = p.rotate(theta+omega*GetTimeSec());
00279           p2 = p.rotate(theta+dTheta+omega*GetTimeSec());
00280           p1 *= scale;
00281           p2 *= scale;
00282           lines.push_back(line2f(p1.x,p1.y,p2.x,p2.y));
00283           theta += dTheta;
00284         }
00285         dTheta = 2.0*M_PI/double(numPoints);
00286         theta = 0.0;
00287         for(int i=0;i<numPoints;i++){
00288           vector2d p(3500.0,0.0);
00289           p = p*max(0.0,1.1+sin(sin(2.0*theta)*M_PI))/2.0;
00290           p = p.rotate(theta+omega*GetTimeSec())+offset;
00291           p *= scale;
00292           points.push_back(vector2f(p.x,p.y));
00293           theta += dTheta;
00294         }
00295         display->updateLines(lines);
00296         display->updatePoints(points);
00297         Sleep(0.016);
00298       }
00299       if(debug) printf("Terminating testMode thread. runApp:%d ok():%d\n",runApp?1:0,ros::ok()?1:0);
00300     }else{
00301       
00302       vectorMap = VectorMap(map_name,mapsFolder.c_str(), false);
00303       
00304       ros::Subscriber guiSub;
00305       ros::Subscriber statusSub;
00306       ros::Subscriber laserSub;
00307       ros::Subscriber localizationSub;
00308       
00309       laserSub = n->subscribe("laser", 1, &MyThread::laserCallback, this);
00310       localizationSub = n->subscribe("localization", 1, &MyThread::localizationCallback, this);
00311       guiSub = n->subscribe("localization_gui", 1, &MyThread::statusCallback, this);
00312       
00313       drawMap(lines, lineColors);
00314       display->updateLines(lines, lineColors);
00315       
00316       while(runApp && ros::ok()){
00317         spinOnce();
00318         compileDisplay();
00319         Sleep(0.001);
00320       }
00321       if(debug) printf("Terminating thread. runApp:%d ok():%d\n",runApp?1:0,ros::ok()?1:0);
00322     }
00323     app->quit();
00324   }
00325   public:
00326     MyThread(const char* _mapsFolder, QObject* parent = 0) : vectorMap(_mapsFolder)
00327     { 
00328       mapsFolder = string(_mapsFolder); 
00329       pathPlan.clear(); 
00330     }
00331     ~MyThread(){}
00332 };

00334 
00335 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00336 {
00337   static const bool debug = false;
00338   ColourTerminal(TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_GREEN,TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_BLACK,TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_ATTR_BRIGHT);
00339   printf("\nVector LIDAR Localization GUI\n\n");
00340   ResetTerminal();
00341   
00342   if(debug) printf("Starting up...\n");
00343   
00344   ros::init(argc, argv, "vector_LIDAR_GUI");
00345   map_name = (char*) malloc(4096);
00346   snprintf(map_name, 4095, "GHC7");
00347   // option table
00348   static struct poptOption options[] = {
00349     { "test-mode",        't', POPT_ARG_NONE ,   &testMode,           0, "Test Drawing Capabilities", "NONE"},
00350     { "map-name",         'm', POPT_ARG_STRING , &map_name,           0, "Map name",                  "STRING"},
00351     { "save-locs",        's', POPT_ARG_NONE,    &saveLocs,           0, "Save Locations",            "NONE"},
00352     { "live-view",        'l', POPT_ARG_NONE,    &liveView,           0, "Live View of Robot",        "NONE"},
00353     { "persistent-display",'p', POPT_ARG_NONE,   &persistentDisplay,  0, "Persistent Display",        "NONE"},
00354     { "save-orientation",  'S', POPT_ARG_NONE,   &saveOrientations,   0, "Save Orientations",         "NONE"},
00355     
00356     POPT_AUTOHELP
00357     { NULL, 0, 0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL }
00358   };
00359   // parse options
00360   POpt popt(NULL,argc,(const char**)argv,options,0);
00361   int c;
00362   while((c = popt.getNextOpt()) >= 0){
00363   }
00364   if(saveOrientations)
00365     saveLocs = true;
00366   
00367   app = new QApplication(argc, argv);
00368   display = new VectorDisplay();
00369   
00370   display->setCallback(&callback);
00371   
00372   n = new ros::NodeHandle();
00373   localizationClient = n->serviceClient<LocalizationInterfaceSrv>("localization_interface");
00374   
00375   InitHandleStop(&runApp);
00376   display->show();
00377   MyThread thread(ros::package::getPath("cgr_localization").append("/maps/").c_str());
00378   thread.start();
00379   int retVal = app->exec();
00380   runApp = false;
00381   if(debug) printf("Waiting for thread termination... ");
00382   thread.wait();
00383   if(debug) printf("Done. Bye Bye!\n");
00384   return retVal;
00385 }
